user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to reply to me (mark@technotronix.com) about Eric'"'"'s recent absences and review Eric'"'"'s personal file in Gmail for the relevant information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Update on Eric’s Recent Absences

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please review Eric’s personal file in Gmail regarding his recent absences and send me an update at mark@technotronix.com when you have a chance? Your insights will help us address the situation promptly and ensure we’re providing Eric with any necessary support.

Thanks in advance for your assistance, and please let me know if you need anything from my side.

Best regards,  
Mark

final_output:
